name: ExtensionUKCoreNHSNumberVerificationStatus
title: Extension UK Core NHS Number Verification Status
description: This extension extends the identifier element of the Patient resource to support the exchange of information on the verification and tracing status of a Patient's NHS Number, as a Codeable Concept. This is currently not supported by the FHIR standard.
purpose: Information describing the verification and tracing status of a patient's NHS Number.

element.definition: The verification/tracing status of the NHS number.

element.short: Verification status of the NHS number
element.definition: Verification status of the NHS number.
